Interface AnyError

All Superinterfaces:
ItemStatus
All Known Subinterfaces:
AnyValue<T>, Hope<T>, ManyErrors, None, Nope, SingleError, Some<T>
public interface AnyError extends ItemStatus
Generic interface for classes with error data

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default @NotNull None
    anyway(@NotNull Runnable action)
    performs an action keeping any previous errors, the action is performed regardless of the error status.
    default @NotNull None
    anyway(@NotNull Supplier<? extends ItemStatus> action)
    performs a fallible action and adds any errors to any previous ones, the action is performed regardless of the error status.
    @NotNull Optional<String>
    summary()
    summary of any errors
